item.title: 派拉蒙+（Paramount+）将与 PBR 签订为期五年的新协议，流媒体播放 PBR 的《释放野兽》（Unleash the Beast
item.description: Skydance 旗下的派拉蒙公司与美国职业斗牛士协会（Professional Bull Riders）周三表示，双方已签署一项为期五年的媒体版权协议，美国职业斗牛士协会的 "释放野兽"（Unleash the Beast）系列联赛将于 12 月开始在派拉蒙+ 频道播出。【原文：Skydance-owned Paramount and Professional Bull Riders have signed a five-year media rights agreement that would bring PBR's "Unleash the Beast" league series on Paramount+ starting in December, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司研究新产品，强调财务纪律
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司首席执行官弗朗西斯科-戈梅斯-内图（Francisco Gomes Neto）告诉路透社记者，该公司正在研究可以推动长期增长的新产品，但这些产品必须根据巴西飞机制造商的财务状况来考虑。【原文：Embraer is studying new products that could drive long-term growth, but these would have to be considered in light of the Brazilian planemaker's finances, CEO Francisco Gomes Neto told Reuters.】

item.title: 英格兰银行布里登敲响英美稳定币合作的战鼓
item.description: 英格兰银行副行长萨拉-布里登（Sarah Breeden）周三表示，美国和英国在稳定币监管方面保持同步 "非常重要"。【原文：The Bank of England deputy governor Sarah Breeden on Wednesday said it was ‘really important’ that the US and the UK are synchronised on stablecoin regulation.】

item.title: 美国银行财富管理部门新资产净值增长 4%-5
item.description: 美国银行高管周三表示，该行财富业务的中期目标是实现 4% 至 5% 的新资产净增长。【原文：Bank of America's wealth business is targeting 4% to 5% net new asset growth in the medium term, executives said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟与中国建立特殊渠道确保稀土供应，专员称
item.description: 欧盟贸易委员马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）周三表示，欧盟已与中国当局建立了 "特别沟通渠道"，以确保对欧盟工业至关重要的稀土材料的流通。【原文：The European Union has established a "special channel" of communication with Chinese authorities to secure the flow of rare earth materials vital for EU industries, EU Trade Commissioner Maros Sefcovic said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 纽约联储：第三季度美国家庭债务小幅增长
item.description: 纽约联储周三表示，由于某种形式的借贷问题趋于稳定，学生贷款问题加剧，第三季度美国家庭总体债务水平略有上升。【原文：Overall U.S. household debt levels increased modestly in the third quarter as borrowing in some form of trouble stabilized and student loan woes increased, the New York Federal Reserve said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 国泰航空以 8.973 亿美元回购卡塔尔航空股份
item.description: 香港旗舰航空公司国泰航空公司周三表示，将以 69.7 亿港元（8.9733 亿美元）的总代价回购卡塔尔航空公司持有的全部股份。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways will repurchase all of its shares owned by Qatar Airways for a total consideration of HK$6.97 billion ($897.33 million), Hong Kong's flagship carrier said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 保险科技公司 Exzeo 在纽交所首秀表现平平，估值 19 亿美元
item.description: 保险技术公司 Exzeo Group 的股票周三在纽约证券交易所首次亮相时开盘持平，与保险行业强劲上市的趋势背道而驰，公司估值近 19.1 亿美元。【原文：Insurance technology firm Exzeo Group's shares opened flat in their New York Stock Exchange debut on Wednesday, bucking the trend of strong listings in the insurance sector and valuing the company at nearly $1.91 billion.】

item.title: 本田为下一代车型配备轻型平台，押宝混合动力汽车
item.description: 本田汽车周四表示，该公司正在开发一个以中型混合动力汽车为核心的平台和一个用于大型汽车的混合动力系统。【原文：Honda Motor said on Thursday it is developing a platform centred on mid-size hybrid cars and a hybrid system for large vehicles, as the Japanese automaker seeks to boost competitiveness amid a slower shift to fully electric cars.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份服务业活动加速；就业依然低迷
item.description: 10 月份，美国服务业活动在新订单稳健增长的带动下有所回升，但就业低迷表明，在进口关税带来的经济不确定性背景下，劳动力市场状况乏善可陈。【原文：U.S. services sector activity picked up in October amid a solid increase in new orders, but subdued employment pointed to lackluster labor market conditions against the backdrop of economic uncertainty stemming from tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 导航设备制造商 Trimble 上调年度预期，经常性收入创历史新高
item.description: Trimble 受益于其将导航设备与软件捆绑在一起用于建筑和运输等行业的战略，在周三超过季度预期后上调了年度盈利预期。【原文：Trimble raised its annual earnings forecast after surpassing quarterly estimates on Wednesday, benefitting from its strategy to bundle its navigation equipment with software for industries such as construction and transportation.】

item.title: 加航预计劳动力成本将增加，2026 年新飞机数量将创历史新高
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）的高管周三告诉分析师们，该公司计划在机队中增加 35 架新飞机，2026 年该公司将面临劳动力成本上升和美国休闲旅游低迷的困境。【原文：Air Canada is set to wrestle with higher labor costs and sluggish U.S. leisure travel in 2026, as the country's largest carrier plans to bring 35 new planes into its fleet, company executives told analysts on Wednesday.】

item.title: 加拿大 10 月份服务业采购经理人指数显示该行业今年首次出现扩张
item.description: S&P全球公司周三公布的加拿大服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）数据显示，由于企业显示出适应经济不确定性的迹象，加拿大服务业经济在10月份出现了11个月以来的首次扩张。【原文：Canada's services economy expanded in October for the first time in 11 months as businesses showed signs of adjusting to economic uncertainty, S&P Global's Canada services PMI data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 莱昂纳多报告 9 个月订单、销售额和核心利润均实现两位数增长
item.description: 意大利航空航天与防务集团莱昂纳多（Leonardo）周三报告称，与2024年相比，今年前九个月的订单、收入和核心利润均实现了两位数的增长。【原文：Italy's aerospace and defence group Leonardo reported on Wednesday double-digit growth for orders, revenues and core profit in the first nine months of the year compared to 2024.】

item.title: 路易斯维尔 UPS 世界港：全球物流的神经中枢
item.description: 包裹巨头联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）的宽体货机在周二晚些时候起飞后不久突然起火，造成包括三名机组人员在内的九人死亡，随后该公司停止了在路易斯维尔国际机场的货物分拣业务。【原文：Parcel giant United Parcel Service halted cargo-sorting operations at Louisville International Airport after its wide-body freighter burst into flames shortly after takeoff on late Tuesday, killing nine people, including three crew members.】

item.title: 加密货币公司瑞波在最新一轮投资中融资 5 亿美元
item.description: 加密货币公司瑞波（Ripple）周三表示，该公司已筹集到 5 亿美元战略投资，估值达 400 亿美元，此轮融资由 Fortress Investment Group 和 Citadel Securities 领投。【原文：Ripple has raised $500 million in a strategic investment valuing it at $40 billion, the crypto firm said on Wednesday, in a funding round led by Fortress Investment Group and Citadel Securities.】

item.title: 世界经济论坛负责人警告全球经济可能出现三个 "泡沫
item.description: 世界经济论坛（World Economic Forum）负责人周三在全球科技股暴跌之际发表评论称，全球应警惕金融市场可能出现的三个泡沫，其中包括人工智能。【原文：The world should watch out for three possible bubbles in financial markets, including artificial intelligence, the head of the World Economic Forum said on Wednesday, in comments that came amid sharp falls in global technology stocks.】

item.title: 宝马领导人称中国对德国品牌构成 "非常重大 "的挑战
item.description: 豪华汽车制造商宝马在匈牙利的新工厂负责人周三表示，中国对德国汽车制造商构成了 "非常重大的 "竞争挑战，而中国的竞争对手比亚迪也即将在匈牙利投产。【原文：China poses a "very significant" competitive challenge to German carmakers, the head of luxury carmaker BMW's new Hungarian plant said on Wednesday, with Chinese rival BYD soon to start production in the country.】

item.title: 外汇预测专家坚持看跌观点，交易员将继续净空美元
item.description: 路透社周三对外汇策略师进行的一项调查显示，由于未来几个月美联储将继续多次降息，美元汇率将走软，交易商将在11月份之前净空仓美元。【原文：Traders will be net short on the U.S. dollar through November as the currency weakens over coming months on continued bets of multiple Federal Reserve interest rate cuts, a Reuters survey of foreign exchange strategists showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 由于关税损害了泰瑟枪制造商的季度利润，Axon股价延续跌势
item.description: Axon Enterprise 的股价在周三的盘前交易中下跌了 19%，一天前，这家泰瑟枪制造商因美国关税导致成本上升，第三季度利润未能达到分析师的预期。【原文：Shares of Axon Enterprise slipped 19% in premarket trading on Wednesday, a day after the Taser maker missed analysts' estimates for third-quarter profit due to higher costs from U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 Armis 在最新一轮融资中估值 61 亿美元
item.description: Armis 周三表示，它在新一轮融资中筹集了 4.35 亿美元，这家美国以色列网络安全公司的估值达到 61 亿美元，在一年多的时间里增长了 45% 以上。【原文：Armis said on Wednesday it has raised $435 million in its fundraising round, valuing the US-Israeli cybersecurity firm at $6.1 billion, marking an over 45% increase in just over a year.】

item.title: Emerson 第四季度营收不及预期，股价下滑
item.description: 艾默生电气周三公布的第四季度财报显示，该公司第四季度收入低于预期，原因是其自动化设备需求不稳定。【原文：Emerson Electric reported a lower-than-expected fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, as the company contends with choppy demand for its automation equipment.】

item.title: 美国 10 月私营部门就业人数反弹，但部分行业就业岗位继续减少
item.description: 10 月份，美国私营企业薪资大幅反弹，但由于专业商业服务等一些行业连续第三个月减少就业岗位，因此这一转机可能并不表明劳动力市场发生了实质性变化。【原文：U.S. private payrolls rebounded sharply in October, but the turnaround likely does not suggest a material shift in the labor market because some industries such as professional business services shed jobs for a third straight month.】

item.title: 因人工智能驱动的数据中心需求，铁山公司第三季度盈利超出预期
item.description: 铁山公司（Iron Mountain）周三公布的第三季度一项关键盈利指标超出华尔街预期，原因是在人工智能应用需求不断增长的情况下，企业纷纷转向该公司的数据中心。【原文：Iron Mountain beat Wall Street estimates for a key earnings metric in the third quarter on Wednesday, as businesses turn to its data centers amid rising demand for AI applications.】

item.title: 国际市场疲软，Zimmer下调2025年有机销售额增长预期
item.description: 由于拉美和欧洲新兴市场疲软，Zimmer Biomet 控股公司下调了 2025 年有机收入增长预期，周三股价下跌 15%。【原文：Zimmer Biomet Holdings cut its 2025 organic revenue growth forecast following weakness in Latin America and emerging markets in Europe, sending shares 15% lower on Wednesday.】

item.title: Ceres Power 因与中国数据中心达成电力交易而股价大涨
item.description: 英国清洁能源技术开发商 Ceres Power 宣布与其最大的中国股东达成一项许可协议，帮助为数据中心供电，此后该公司周三大涨逾 23%。【原文：Ceres Power surged over 23% on Wednesday after the British clean-energy technology developer announced a licensing deal with its largest Chinese shareholder to help power data centres.】

item.title: 支付处理商 FIS 因银行解决方案部门的推动而实现超预期利润
item.description: 银行和支付处理公司富达国家信息服务公司（Fidelity National Information Services）周三公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其银行解决方案部门的强劲需求。【原文：Banking and payments processing firm Fidelity National Information Services beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by strong demand in its banking solutions unit.】

item.title: Cencora 将投资 10 亿美元用于美国药品分销，并发布 2026 年乐观预测
item.description: Cencora 公司周三表示，将在 2030 年前投资超过 10 亿美元，以扩大其在美国的网络，此前该公司预测明年的调整后利润将高于华尔街预期。【原文：Cencora will invest over $1 billion through 2030 to expand its U.S. network, the drug distributor said on Wednesday, after forecasting adjusted profit for next year above Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: 江森自控因数据中心需求，2026 年利润高于预期
item.description: 江森自控国际公司（Johnson Controls International）周三预计，2026 年的利润将高于预期，主要得益于数据中心对其建筑和工业设备的持续需求。【原文：Johnson Controls International forecast 2026 profit above expectations on Wednesday, banking on sustained demand from data centers for its building and industrial equipment.】

item.title: 特斯拉 10 月德国汽车销量减半，电动汽车销量大增
item.description: 德国道路交通机构 KBA 周三表示，尽管电池电动汽车的销量总体上有所增长，但特斯拉 10 月份在德国的销量比去年同期减少了一半多。【原文：Tesla's sales volume in Germany more than halved in October from the same month last year, the German road traffic agency KBA said on Wednesday, although sales of battery electric vehicles rose overall.】
